snippet: Speaker John A. Boehner offered no clue on Friday as to how he expected Congress to get out of the dead end it has found itself in, with the government shut for a fourth day.
abstract: Speaker John A Boehner, in closed-door meeting of House Republicans, offers no clue as to how he expects Congress to get out of the dead end it has found itself in, as the government remains shut for fourth day; many rivals and allies criticize Boehner, saying he and his leadership team have no real idea how to resolve fiscal showdown.

byline.original: By JONATHAN WEISMAN and ASHLEY PARKER

lead_paragraph: Speaker John A. Boehner offered no clue on Friday as to how he expected Congress to get out of the dead end it has found itself in, with the government shut for a fourth day.

headline.main: Boehner Urges G.O.P. Unity in ‘Epic Battle’
headline.print_headline: Boehner Urges G.O.P. Solidarity in ‘Epic Battle’

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
